description: Try our easy to follow Ginger Cream Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ginger Cream Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the cream and sugar to a simmer over medium heat. Remove from the heat and stir in the ginger and star anise. Cover and let stand for 1 hour. Reheat the milk until piping hot. Strain the milk into a bowl.
Whisk the yolks in another bowl until thickened. Whisk in the hot cream. Strain the cream mixture back into the saucepan.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until the custard coats the back of a spoon. Do not boil. Pour into eight dessert dishes and sift five-spice powder on top, if desired. Serve warm.
